nodes.text: Trooper was the name of a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It depicted an image of a clone trooper from the latter part of the Clone Wars.
Trooper was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
